Title: Supernova (1)
Plot:
Memories of his own daughter's death are stirred up when Leo is called in to investigate the apparent suicide of a 14-year-old girl, Alison Garland.


With the help of child psychologist Caroline, Leo realises that Alison was, in fact, murdered. But they are stumped when the killing is linked to Harry's case, in which a car salesman has been stabbed to death apparently with the same knife. As Leo gets deeper into the unfamiliar teenage world he starts to suspect the school rebel, Fish ? but is t
ParentalRatingReason: Horror and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Ingeborga Dapkunaite, Amerjit Deu, Pavel Douglas, Tamsin Egerton
